name: Pepper Time (Prototype Demo)
description:
PEPPER TIME PROTOTYPE DEMO

A small little demo of Pepper Time I threw together. Grab and throw things!

Music - https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure - by https://juhanijunkala.com/ , used under CC0

SFX - made with sfxr.

CONTROLS

Keyboard/ (XBox) Controller - Function (Note: Other Controllers might work but they are not accounted for.)

X/A - Jump

C/X - Dash/Grab

DPad/Arrow Keys - Directional Inputs/Aiming

Start - Pause (Note: There might be some oddities with pausing because I forgot something. Just be aware!)

Notes (Read Before Playing!)

  • This is something I would consider "Rough". There's probably a couple of softlocks/crashes I missed. Sorry if that happens!
  • Rough Playtime should be about 10-20 minutes. Less if you speed thru it! There isnt a lot but its mostly just me figuring out what to do with this gameplay.
  • Made in Game Maker Studio 2.

I hope you enjoy this small demo!
